exception.name: ErrorGetCurrentSeTimeFailed
exception.description: This exception is thrown if the SE API function getCurrentSeTime fails to obtain the current time of the Secure Element.

javadoc.summary: This class defines the exception ErrorGetCurrentSeTimeFailed that is thrown if the SE API function getCurrentSeTime fails to obtain the current time of the Secure Element.

specification.requirement: SHALL be raised when Secure Element time retrieval fails
